#Data Source: American Community Survey via
[IPUMS USA](https://usa.ipums.org/usa/)

Loading in relevant programs
```{r}
library(ipumsr)
library(tidyverse)
library(haven)
library(ggplot2)
library(srvyr)
```

Reading in the data set:
```{r}
ddi <- read_ipums_ddi("usa_00001.xml")
data <- read_ipums_micro(ddi)
```
